page.title: 08A SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: We took a survey of pupils in our school to find out more about their preferences and the way they live. We discovered that: Most pupils come to school by bus. Most use the school canteen for lunch. Maths is the least favourite subject. Art is the most popular subject. The favourite meal is steak and chips. The most popular drink is coca_cola. Blue is the favourite colour. Dogs are the most popular pets. Horse_riding is the favourite hobby. Tennis is the most popular sport. Daley Thompson is the favourite sports' personality. James Herbert is the favourite author. Clint Eastwood is the favourite actor. Howard Jones is the favourite singer. Duran Duran is the favourite pop_group "The Young Ones" is the favourite T.V. programme.
